name: Cavern Explorer: A One Screen Adventure
name_original: Cavern Explorer: A One Screen Adventure
description:
Controls Arrow Keys or AWSD for Movement E to Interact Aim with Mouse, Left Click to Shoot Right Click to Shrink                  Z to Switch Skins                

Embark on an epic adventure as an explorer in a vast underground world filled with treacherous caverns and fearsome bosses. Experience the thrill of battling giant monsters and discovering hidden secrets in a beautifully crafted pixel art style. With one screen that's only 480x270 pixels to navigate, you'll be fully immersed in the action as you explore every corner of the map. But be on the lookout, there are three secret areas waiting to be discovered, filled with even greater challenges and rewards. Can you conquer the bosses and uncover all the mysteries of the caverns?

Note: Runs best on Chrome.

Features
  • Six cavern sections to discover and explore.
  • Upgrade jumps and fire power to defeat all the enemies and reach all the locations.
  • Shrink ability to unlock that provides access to new areas and makes it easier to avoid enemies.
  • Secret ending....
Development

This game was developed over the course of a week. After many unfinished prototypes I figured I'd constrain myself to the extremes and force myself to finish a project. Let me know if you run into any bugs and I will fix them. If you enjoyed the game and want to know if I release anything new, follow me on the socials below. :)
